"The Ice Maiden."

Man, that was the golden era of tennis.

comment.author: 47172217@N00
comment._content: I wonder if she new that she would be married for a record short time to a man consumed more by his ambition and drive to win from a small continent than a desire to please and truly love?.  Ah we were all so innocent then.
